summary: A young assassin is sent to kill and retired mob boss. But things get complicated when she begins to like him.
cast: Song Kang-Ho|Se-Kyung Shin|Jeong-myeong Cheon|Min-Joon Kim|Jong-Hyuk Lee|Esom|Yuh-jung Youn|Kyeong-yeong Lee|Roe-ha Kim|Dal-su Oh|Yeong-jin Jo|Jong-goo Kim|Gi-won Yang
title: Poo-reun so-geum
